Resources for the different Sweden Connect federations
======================================================

Production:
-----------

Metadata download URL: https://md.swedenconnect.se/role/sp.xml
Metadata verification certificate: prod-metadata.crt

See https://www.swedenconnect.se/anslut/saml-metadata

QA:
---

Metadata download URL: https://qa.md.swedenconnect.se/role/sp.xml
Metadata verification certificate: qa-metadata.crt

See https://www.swedenconnect.se/anslut/saml-metadata

Sandbox:
--------

Metadata download URL: https://eid.svelegtest.se/metadata/mdx/role/sp.xml
Metadata verification certificate: sandbox-metadata.crt

See https://eid.svelegtest.se/mdreg/home
